idea:
The startup aims to provide trained manpower and consultancy services to Government Hospitals which are empanelledunder various social health insurance schemes. The startup will provide a dedicated team of properly trained and qualified employees who will be responsible to handle all the core non clinical administrative functions pertaining to social health insurance schemes in the Government Hospital. This will help Government hospitals to earn maximum revenue through social health insurance schemes by

• Covering maximum eligible patients under the social health insurance scheme

• Minimizing the rejection/ pendency of preauthorization – by ensuring proper documents uploading within a defined turnaround time, timely updating of pending preauth cases

• Minimizing rejection/ deduction of claims – by ensuring submission of all claims within defined turnaround time with proper documents, updating pending claims and making timely appeals for wrongly rejected/ deducted claims.

Commission will be charged in the form of 5-10 % fees on total claims paid amountfor the medical treatment/ surgeries performed by the Government Hospital through social health insurance schemes.
name: MAXIM HEALTH SERVICES LLP

idea: Recruitment Consultancy - Mid and senior level for corporates
name: Humantra HR Solutions Pvt Ltd

idea:
Automech Institute Online Technical Training (OPC) Private Limited launched live online certification & diploma program which provides  complete technical knowledge and practical skills.
10th/12th pass candidates can pursue this course and start their career as an automobile technician or choose to specialize in one of the varied career paths that have emerged within the industry.
Also, engineering students in the fields of automotive and mechanical engineering who lack practical knowledge will benefit from this course by clarifying their concepts and gaining virtual practical knowledge.
Upon successful completion of this program work at established repair shops, car dealerships and even open your own business.
name: automech institute online technical training (opc) pvt ltd

idea:
Company Profile: The Urban Medicare is established in the year 2020, dealing in oxygen & breathing apparatus with an intention to supply purified air to one and all. We are also in product & service development which will cater special solutions as an added benefit to the society.

Product Developed: O2NERGY - The ReVitalizer,  which provides tissue oxygenation in an appropriate manner to enhance the metabolism, boost immunity system and for speedy recovery from illness.

Aim & Objective: Currently we have developed a minimum viable product (MVP), under the incubator assistance we will develop the final product which requires automation & aesthetic works. Our plan is to achieve final product within 6 months from date of fund receiving. Meanwhile we will promote our MVP model to doctors & patients to gain their confidence and for word of mouth publicity, which we strongly believe in.
name: The Urban Medicare

idea: Medius Technologies Private Limited founded in 2021 is an Artificial Intelligence based debt collection software. The company claims to be offering debt collection solutions to banks and non-banking finance companies seamlessly via their software.
name: MEDIUS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
